resources.string: Shhh! is monitoring the device\'s media volume. We will show you a notification when it is on.
Shhh! is not monitoring the device\'s media volume at the moment.
In order for the app to function normally, some permissions are necessary. Please confirm them in the following dialogs.
All required permissions are already granted.
Some permissions necessary for running the app are missing. Please check out and allow denied permissions in the following screen.
Your Android version is too low. This feature required at least Android version 8.0.
May we show you an ad?

"Showing ads can be a great help to the developer. However since your pleasant user experience with this app is the top priority, you should be the one to have a choice. If you allow us to show you an ad, a small ad banner will be displayed at the bottom of the screen only when the app is running, and if you refuse, we\'ll never show you an ad again without your permission. Would you allow us to show you an ad?"
All necessary permissions have been successfully granted!
Some permissions are necessary for running the app, please check out and allow them.
Warn about media volume even when headset(wired or bluetooth) is connected.
Show current volume output device(Speaker/Headset) in notification icon in status bar.
Show current media volume level in notification icon in status bar. Notification will only be shown when media volume is on.
Open settings window where you can find preferences for each notification provided the app including system priority and whether to show notification icon in status bar.

"Force mute and prevent media volume from changing. If a change in volume is detected, the app will try to put it back down to 0. Works only when headset is not connected. Warning: Due to Android policies, there can be a delay of seconds to minutes between scheduled and actual execution time.
When the app is running, show an ad banner at the bottom of the screen. This can be a great help to the developer, but you can freely disable this option.
Foreground service is up and running.
Click here to hide this notification.
Click here to turn off force mute and it won\'t start again until you change the settings or next scheduled time arrives.
Please manually disable or minimize this notification in the settings window.
